We are not willing or obliged to engage in dispute settlement proceedings of a Consumer Complaint Office.

Contradiction advertising mails

The use of contact data published within the scope of the imprint obligation to contact the sending of unsolicited advertisements and information material is hereby contradicted. The operators of the pages expressly reserve the right to legal action in the event of unsolicited mailing of promotional information, e. g. by spam e-mails.

Source (translated): eRecht24
In case of doubt German version applies.
